content: I see at https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib_stats.html that we're about to hit both 3000 files and 10^6 LOC, which is the top of both of the graphs. Does someone need to make these graphs have more space or will something magical automatically happen when these boundaries are met?
97898 theorems is also pretty close to a round number milestone. :octopus:
